insights.title: Radiation Increases DNA Damage
insights.finding: Space radiation exposure resulted in elevated levels of DNA double-strand breaks in all tested cell types.
insights.recommendation: Consider enhanced radiation shielding or scheduling EVAs during solar minimum periods

insights.title: Microgravity Reduces Bone Density
insights.finding: Exposure to microgravity for 30 days resulted in a significant 15% reduction in bone mineral density in weight-bearing bones.
insights.recommendation: Implement resistance exercise protocols and nutritional countermeasures

insights.title: Exercise Reduces Muscle Atrophy
insights.finding: Resistance exercise protocols effectively mitigated muscle mass loss during simulated microgravity exposure.
insights.recommendation: Implement resistance exercise protocols and nutritional countermeasures

insights.title: Artificial Gravity Prevents Bone Loss
insights.finding: Intermittent artificial gravity significantly reduced bone mineral density loss compared to control groups.

insights.title: Microgravity Affects Immune Function
insights.finding: Spaceflight conditions altered immune cell distribution and cytokine production patterns.
insights.recommendation: Investigate Health Risk implications and develop appropriate countermeasures
